body:
This might explain why a Solaris remote installation returned error messages of missing binaries.
Please notify me if the same condition applies to the Radiance3.9 i386 Solaris package. 


Radiance 3.9 was recently installed at the Sun Microsystems grid site which I am evaluating. 


Steve
